Simple lockboxes are boxes found within the Camdozaal Vault, typically found closer towards the vault's exit. Players must exit the vault before the one minute timer runs out to keep their lockboxes; otherwise, they will lose all lockboxes they have acquired whilst inside. Lockboxes the player was carrying before entering the vault will not be lost.

Simple lockboxes have a 1/25 chance to roll the gear drop table, which contains weapons and armour ranging from iron to adamant.

Contents

  • 1 Loot
    • 1.1 Standard
    • 1.2 Gear drop table
  • 2 Changes

Loot[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Simple lockbox loot is worth 686.36.

Standard[edit | edit source]

Simple lockboxes have three rolls on the loot table. The displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Copper ore2–3 (noted)3 × 10/50190–2852–3
Tin ore2–3 (noted)3 × 8/50154–2312–3

Logs6–8 (noted)3 × 6/50264–35212–16

Feather1–503 × 3/503–1501–50
Fishing bait35–403 × 3/50140–16035–40
Soft clay2–33 × 3/50328–4922–3
Coins50–1503 × 1/5050–15050–150
Tinderbox13 × 1/50420
Fishing rod13 × 1/50493

Gear drop table[edit | edit source]

There is a 2/50 chance of rolling the gear drop table. If one of the player's three rolls on the simple lockbox loot table rolled the gear drop table, they cannot roll for it again.

Below lists the effective drop rates.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 April 2021
(update)

Loot from opening lockboxes have been re-balanced to reflect the time spent to access the Camdozaal Vault.
